2PM

Introduction

Junho is a South Korean singer-songwriter and actor under JYP Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group 2PM. He debuted with the group on September 4, 2008 with the single album 'Hottest Time of the Day'.

He made his Japanese solo debut in June 24, 2013 with his first mini album Kimi no Koe and his Korean solo debut on September 14, 2015 with the best album One.

Junho began his military duty as a public service worker on May 30, 2019. The date of his release was March 20, 2021.

On March 20, 2025, JYP Entertainment announced that Lee Junho's exclusive contract with the company will end on April 15, 2025, and both parties have mutually decided not to renew it after 17 years of partnership. JYP expressed gratitude for his contributions as a 2PM member and actor, while Junho thanked the company for its support over the years. Despite his departure, JYP will continue managing his activities in Japan and supporting future collaborations.
